tool_description: BEST REMOVER FOR IMAGE BACKGROUND, working like a magic, Guaranteed !!!
name: Reviground
title: Reviground

api_list.name: By URL

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
- Max size: 10Mb
- Allowed filetype: jpg, jpeg, png, svg, webp, bmp
-Please ensure you have access to the file directly, not from other third party site like google images, or yahoo images, etc.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
Mode is filter for object type detection to make it more accurate.
Try to use mode for better result.
Default mode is null (empty).

List of mode:
1: Object or thing 1
2: Object or thing 2
3: Human

api_list.name: Upload
api_list.description: Remove background image by uploading file

required_parameters.name: picture
required_parameters.description:
- Max size: 10Mb
- Allowed filetype: jpg, jpeg, png, svg, webp, bmp

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description:
Mode is filter for object type detection to make it more accurate.
Try to use mode for better result.
Default mode is null (empty).

List of mode:
1: Object or thing 1
2: Object or thing 2
3: Human
